SEARCH
Package com.gaminghub.app.data.entity

Class OrderEntity

java.lang.Object
com.gaminghub.app.data.entity.OrderEntity
@Table("orders") public class OrderEntity extends Object
Represents the persistent entity for an order, mapped to the orders table in the database.

This class is part of the data access layer and is used for database operations involving orders. It corresponds directly to the columns in the orders table.

Can be converted to a OrderModel for use in the presentation layer.

See Also:

      Parameters:
      order_id - the unique order ID
      total_amount - the total amount for the order
      customer_id - the customer ID who placed the order
      created_at - timestamp when the order was created
